CHAT.comment: ERICK CORNELL CLAY, Petitioner v. UNITED STATES.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:05 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID W. DE BRUIN, AMICUS CURIAE IN SUPPORT OF THE JUDGMENT BELOW
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:58 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
